February Holiday to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
February Holiday to Be Celebrated in Russia 
   Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia was formed on Jan. 12 to celebrate February 16, the birthday of Kim Jong Il.
 Ju Hui Chol, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee decided to hold multifarious events including a reading session, book exhibition and film show from February 1 to 16.

Congratulations to Nicaraguan FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Nicaraguan FM
   Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, sent a congratulatory message to Samuel Santos Lopez upon his appointment as foreign minister of Nicaragua.
 The message hoped that the relations between the two countries would grow strong in all fields including politics, economy and culture as in the past and wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Wang Ok Hwan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Wang Ok Hwan
   Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il today sent a wreath to the bier of the late Wang Ok Hwan, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter, expressing deep condolences over her death.
